ingredients.ingredient: 3 cloves garlic, minced, or to taste
2 teaspoons Italian seasoning, or to taste
1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste

cookingTips: Trim woody ends of asparagus by snapping at their natural breaking point
Toss asparagus with oil and seasonings, then arrange in single layer for even browning
Bake at 400°F for 12-15 minutes until tender-crisp with lightly charred tips
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Roasted vegetables are a healthy side for any protein. What other vegetables would you like to prepare this way?
